title: Leading trends in appetizers on restaurant menus in the U.S. in 2016
summary: The Leading trends Response in the restaurant menus was Response Vegetarian_appetizers , who made 67 respondents .
The most trends Response was Seafood_charcuterie , with just 24 respondents .

In second place was Response House-cured_meats/charcuterie with 59 respondents ; third place went to Response Fresh/house-made_sausage with 67 respondents ; fourth place went to Response Sliders/mini-burgers with 24 respondents and fifth place went to Response Ethnic/street_food-inspired_appetizers_(e.g._tempura_taquitos_kabobs) , who was 53 respondents .

data.Response: Ethnic/street food-inspired appetizers (e.g. tempura taquitos kabobs)
Ethnic dips (e.g. hummus tabbouleh baba ganoush tzatziki)
Jerky (e.g. beef fish turkey boar bison)

gold: This statistic shows the leading trends in appetizers on restaurant menus in the United States as forecasted by professional chefs for 2016 . During the survey , 59 percent of the respondents stated that house-cured meats/charcuterie was a `` hot trend `` for restaurant menus in 2016 .
